cu.explanation_en: Changing the remote SCTP address to '127.0.0.4' will cause wrong routing definitions, leading to F1 interface connection failure as the DU is bound to '127.0.0.3'.

du.explanation_en: Modifying local_n_address to '127.0.0.4' introduces wrong routing definitions, causing F1 interface connection failure due to address mismatch with the CU.
